name: PlasticsEurope
membership: CLEPA, Renovate Europe, Construction Products Europe, European Risk Forum, CEFIC, Knowledge4Innovation
memberOrga: The list of PlasticsEuropeâ€™s member is available here: http://www.plasticseurope.org/plastics-industry/our-members.aspx
goal: PlasticsEurope is one of the leading European trade associations with centres in Brussels, Frankfurt, London, Madrid, Milan and Paris. We are networking with European and national plastics associations and have more than 100 member companies, producing over 90% of all polymers across the EU28 member states plus Norway, Switzerland and Turkey.
interests: Business and Industry, Climate Action, Competition, Consumers, Education and training, Energy, Environment, Food Safety, General and Institutional Affairs, Public Health, Research and innovation, Single market, Trade, Transport
euInitiatives: Policies related to waste management, marine litter solutions, health, energy efficiency of buildings, climate change and trade.
